verbose_text: As stated earlier, the EA prestimulation (20 Hz) of acupoint Jiaji markedly reduced the phosphorylation of P38, downregulated fos expression, and upregulated beta-endorphin expression in colonic mucosa; a similar effect of EA was found in the SDH [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: EA prestimulation (20 Hz) of acupoint Jiaji markedly reduced the phosphorylation of P38
